summary: The Mystery Inc. crew travels the globe on a transcontinental treasure hunt to solve a series of ancient riddles. Scooby-Doo and Shaggy are indoctrinated by an unlikely Sword Master.
cast: Frank Welker|Casey Kasem|Mindy Cohn|Grey Griffin|Kelly Hu|Kevin Michael Richardson|Sab Shimono|Keone Young|Gedde Watanabe|George Takei|Brian Cox
title: Scooby-Doo y la espada del samur√°i
